@GageHarris_ @justinkan @Twitch So summing up this video. The play-to-earn concept should go away and stop trying to innovate because the current state of it isn‚Äôt ideal. Innovation bad. ‚ÄúWay it was‚Äù good.

Also if you play games, you add no value to society therefore deserve judgement on how you make a living.

People entering crypto should think ‚Äúwhat skill or value from my old career can I bring to this space?‚Äù instead of ‚Äúhow can I make money fast in crypto?‚Äù

The first question will take care of the second.
